tasksList.label: Update Gitlab to tvontario
tasksList.description:
This task will perform the following actions: 
 1. perform `git pull` command 
 2. update **.gitlab-ci.yml** and **webpack.config.js** files 
 3. update **index.js** and **package.json** to point to `@tvontario` 
 4. update package.json name property with course repo name 
 5. update ILOs build version to latest on package.json file 
 6. add “department” : “elem” in any widget .json files (containing **flowchart**, **flashcards**, **sorting**, **fill-in-the-blank**, **multiple-choice**, **matching**, **number-line**, **ten-frame**, **hundred-chart**, **grid-mapping**, **three-d-shape**, **protractor**, **chart**, **money**, or **ebook-reader** in their name) 
 7. delete **vendor.min.js**, **tvo_k8.css**, **package-lock.json**, and **node_modules** 
 8. perform `npm install` command follow by `npm run build` command

tasksList.label: Update ILOs version
tasksList.description:
This task will perform the following actions: 
 1. perform `git pull` command 
 2. update ILOs build version to latest on package.json file 
 3. add “department” : “elem” in any widget .json files (containing **flowchart**, **flashcards**, **sorting**, **fill-in-the-blank**, **multiple-choice**, **matching**, **number-line**, **ten-frame**, **hundred-chart**, **grid-mapping**, **three-d-shape**, **protractor**, **chart**, **money**, or **ebook-reader** in their name) 
 4. delete **vendor.min.js**, **tvo_k8.css**, **package-lock.json**, and **node_modules** 
 5. perform `npm install` command follow by `npm run build` command

tasksList.label: Rebuild K8 CSS and vendor.min.js
tasksList.description:
This task will perform the following actions: 
 1. perform `git pull` command 
 2. delete **vendor.min.js**, **tvo_k8.css**, **package-lock.json**, and **node_modules** 
 3. perform `npm install` command follow by `npm run build` command

tasksList.label: Rebuild vendor.min.js
tasksList.description:
This task will perform the following actions: 
 1. perform `git pull` command 
 2. delete **vendor.min.js**, **package-lock.json**, and **node_modules** 
 3. perform `npm install` command follow by `npm run build` command

tasksList.label: Pull from Gitlab
tasksList.description: This task will perform `git checkout master` and `git pull` commands respectively.

tasksList.label: Push to Gitlab
tasksList.description:
This task will perform the following actions: 
 1. perform `git checkout master` and `git pull` commands respectively 
 2. perform `git add .`, `git commit` and `git push` commands respectively
